00033 #include "batterychargeradvanced.h"
00034 #include "batterychargercalibrate.h"
00035 #include <math.h>
00036 #include <QDebug>
00037 
00038 #define  high(x) ((uchar) (x >> 8) & 0xFF)
00039 #define  low(x) ((uchar) (x & 0xFF))
00040 
00041 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 BatteryChargerAdvanced::BatteryChargerAdvanced(AcqUnit* u,
00059           QWidget* parent) : QDialog(parent)
00060 {
00061     unit = u;
00063     BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.setupUi(this);
00064 // Setup the configure channel 0 for the Advanced settings
00065     appConfigureUnit = new AcqAppConfigUnit(unit,0);
00067     unsigned char measureAverage = 4;
00068     unsigned char measureInterval = 20;
00069     unsigned char storeInterval = 20;
00070     BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.disableControlCheckBox->setChecked(true);
00071     for (uint n=1; n<8; n++)
00072         BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.measureAverageComboBox->
00073                           insertItem(n-1,QString::number(1 << n));
00074     if (appConfigureUnit->isConfigured())
00075     {
00076         measureInterval = appConfigureUnit->getChannelInfoBlock(0);
00077         measureAverage = appConfigureUnit->getChannelInfoBlock(1);
00078         BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.disableControlCheckBox->
00079                     setChecked(appConfigureUnit->getChannelInfoBlock(2));
00080         storeInterval = appConfigureUnit->getChannelInfoBlock(3);
00081     }
00082     BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.measureAverageComboBox->setCurrentIndex(measureAverage);
00084     BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.measureIntervalSpinBox->setValue(measureInterval);
00086     BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.storeIntervalSpinBox->setValue(storeInterval);
00087 }
00088 
00089 BatteryChargerAdvanced::~BatteryChargerAdvanced()
00090 {
00091     delete appConfigureUnit;
00092 }
00093 
00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 void BatteryChargerAdvanced::on_closeButton_clicked()
00099 {
00100     accept();
00101 }
00102 
00103 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00109 void BatteryChargerAdvanced::on_calibrateButton_clicked()
00110 {
00111     unsigned int channel = 0;
00112     if (BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.channelB->isChecked()) channel = 1;
00113     else if (BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.channelC->isChecked()) channel = 2;
00114     else if (BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.channelD->isChecked()) channel = 3;
00115     AcqSimpleAdcUnit* channelUnit = new AcqSimpleAdcUnit(unit,channel);
00116 // Go to the calibrate form
00117     BatteryChargerCalibrate calibrateForm(channelUnit);
00118     calibrateForm.exec();
00119 }
00120 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 void BatteryChargerAdvanced::on_updateButton_clicked()
00128 {
00129     unsigned char infoBlock[10];
00130     unsigned char index = 0;
00131     bool ok;
00132     infoBlock[index++] = BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.measureIntervalSpinBox->value();
00133     infoBlock[index++] = BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.measureAverageComboBox->currentIndex();
00134     infoBlock[index++] = BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.disableControlCheckBox->isChecked();
00135     infoBlock[index++] = BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.storeIntervalSpinBox->value();
00136     ok = appConfigureUnit->programInformationBlock(index+1,infoBlock);
00137     if (! ok) displayErrorMessage("Could not program device");
00138 }
00139 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00145 void BatteryChargerAdvanced::displayErrorMessage(const QString message)
00146 {
00147      BatteryChargerAdvancedDialogUi.errorLabel->setText(message);
00148 }
